title: Universal Bike Phone Mount/Mountain Bicycle Phone Holder/Cell Phone Mount for Motorcycle/Handlebar GPS Holder (BB028)
features: ✅CHARACTERISTICS: The scalable length of bike phone mount is suitable for phones: in height 4.5-7 in ( 11.5-17.8 cm) and in width: 2.3-3.5 in ( 6-8.9 cm). Make navigation easier with phone holder. Hold your cell phone firmly in place for security while you drive/ride on a bumpy road.

✅DESIGN: 360 degree bike mount rotations adjust for ideal viewing at portrait or landscape angles. Easy one-touch phone holder mounting system allows for the locking and releasing of the device with just the push of a finger
✅DESCRIPTION: Universal Bike Motorcycle holder for most smartphones, PDA and GPS devices.Fits most bicycle and motorcycle.Easy to mount and release.
✅WARRANTY: BetterBuys' universal bike handlebar mount holder for cell phone come with one year warranty due to its high-quality and durable materials.

✅SAFE: Bicycle phone mount Comes with four support corners to ensure your phone stays securely attached throughout your bicycle or motorcycle. Holder is made of ABS and soft rubber, anti-slid and protects your cell phone from scratches.
description: ✔ 360 Degree Rotating ✔ 2 Instant Locks ✔ Four support corners ✔ Convenient Tool-free Installation ✔ Anti-fall & Anti-shake ✔ Anti-vibration & Anti-Slip ✔ Adjustable Angle ✔ Telescopic Arm
